thread.title: Official: Lucas Piazon extends Fulham loan to end of season
thread.title_full: Official: Lucas Piazon extends Fulham loan to end of season

author: David Pasztor
title: Official: Lucas Piazon extends Fulham loan to end of season
text: Rec A few bits of loan news that we need to catch up with, including just down the road at Fulham Football Club, where Lucas Piazon’s loan extension to the end of the season has now been made official. The Club is delighted to confirm that @LucasPiazon 's loan deal has been extended until the end of the season > https://t.co/GO5DVPAb3x pic.twitter.com/PCACHJPpYZ — Fulham Football Club (@FulhamFC) January 17, 2017 “The Club”! Piazon, who will celebrate his 23rd birthday in a couple days, seems to have fully bought into The Club’s ethos and it wouldn’t surprise me if he eventually converted this into a permanent move, provided that Fulham The Club could afford him. Chelsea paid £5m+ back in 2011 (possibly rising to £10m), and we would look to turn a small profit as usual. A bit further down the pyramid, Chelsea defender/midfielder Dion Conroy has extended his loan stay at non-league Aldershot Town. This news is possibly almost a month old, but I don’t recall reading about it before, so here it is anyway. We are delighted that Dion Conroy @dionjc95 has extended his loan from @ChelseaFC until the end of the season https://t.co/uycaI3dN2w pic.twitter.com/niC0NYf7kX — Aldershot Town FC (@OfficialShots) December 22, 2016 Chelsea official also confirmed Jhoao Rodríguez’s loan switch from Santa Fe to Cortuluá in Colombia ( HUGE NEWS ), as well as goalkeeper Nathan Baxter’s loan switch from Met Police to Solihull Moors. We’re really scraping the depths of the league pyramid here... ️ #SMFC boss Liam McDonald: "It's a big boost for the football club to bring in such a young talent from @ChelseaFC ." https://t.co/NaUw4BJXgW — Solihull Moors FC (@SolihullMoors) January 16, 2017
